value:
$WmMPID_比翼エリス,ch01_00_Marth_MF_Pair,Face|Warm winter greetings to you all!
It is an absolute pleasure to be here.
I am sincerely delighted!$k$p$nMPID_比翼マルス|This is a battlefield, Elice. You could
stand to be a little less delighted.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリス|With this festive atmosphere, how
could I? Just look at our beautiful
reindeer man, here!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_WinterFes19,Face|My name is Jaffar.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エリス,ch01_00_Marth_MF_Pair,Face|Of course—my apologies! It's just...a
bit difficult to see past the antlers,
that's all.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_WinterFes19,Face|Right...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_比翼マルス,ch01_00_Marth_MF_Pair,Face|We'd best retreat for now, Elice.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリス|These foes are a bit much for us,
aren't they? Very well, let's!$k$p$Sbs150|
